addons.name: MediaMod
addons.description: View your current song in Minecraft with support for services like Spotify, YouTube, SoundCloud & more!
addons.author: ConorTheDev, AmpTheDev, asbyth

addons.name: Arrow Trails
addons.description: Visualize where your arrows are headed once shot.
addons.author: asbyth, aycy

addons.name: Victory Royale
addons.description: Display the Fortnite Victory Royale image & play the sound once winning a Hypixel game.
addons.author: asbyth, Sk1er

addons.name: Timers
addons.description: Adds timers sent from the server onto the screen.
addons.author: LlamaLad7

addons.name: Quickplay
addons.description: Provides an interface to quickly join Hypixel minigames. This is currently on an unofficial build by asbyth.
addons.author: Bugfroggy, asbyth
